author: Charlie Hall
title: A beginner’s guide to buying and painting miniatures
description: Painting miniatures can be relaxing and meditative. It’s also a great way to spruce up your board games and RPGs. Here’s a shopping list to get you started, plus quick tips on where to get great advice online.
